oauth.description: Lets start with an entity name

oauth2.description: Thanks, as of November 2024, YouTube Music requires a Client Id and Secret for the YouTube Data API to connect to the API. Please open https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials, click create credentials -> OAuth Client ID and  pick TVs and Limited Input devices.

oauth3.description: Great, your OAuth works. After readind the next steps open the URL below. Next Steps: You have to confirm the same code twice, then connect it to you google account, (expand the page) and allow accesss. Only after this is done go to the next step here.

finish.description: Please enter the path and the cookie data. Further information available at https://github.com/KoljaWindeler/ytube_music_player. As of November 2024, YouTube Music requires a Client Id and Secret for the YouTube Data API to connect to the API. Please open https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials, click create credentials -> OAuth Client ID and  pick TVs and Limited Input devices.

data.speakers: Select the output devices, the first one will be the default device
data.api_language: The language parameter of the ytmusicapi, which determines the language of the returned results
data.header_path: File path for the header file

adv_finish.description: You can configure some behaviors of the player here, such as limiting data usage and setting the maximum number of tracks loaded per session.

data.brand_id: Enter a brand id if you are using a brand account
data.proxy_path: Local path for proxy mode, leave blank if you don't need it
data.proxy_url: Base URL for proxy mode, leave blank if you don't need it
data.like_in_name: Show like status in the name
data.debug_as_error: Show all debug output as ERROR in the log
data.legacy_radio: Create radio as watchlist of random playlist track
data.sort_browser: Sort results in the media browser
data.extra_sensor: Create sensor that provide extra information
data.dropdowns: Create the dropdown(s) you want to use
data.select_speakers: Entity id of input_select for speaker selection(Deprecated. Leaving a space can permanently delete this field)
data.select_playmode: Entity id of input_select for playmode selection(Deprecated. Leaving a space can permanently delete this field)
data.select_source: Entity id of input_select for playlist/radio selection(Deprecated. Leaving a space can permanently delete this field)
data.select_playlist: Entity id of input_select for playlist selection(Deprecated. Leaving a space can permanently delete this field)
data.select_playcontinuous: Entity id of input_boolean for play continuous selection(Deprecated. Leaving a space can permanently delete this field)

error.ERROR_GENERIC: Something with your cookie wasn't right. Format and fields are ok but the login failed
error.ERROR_OAUTH: Your OAuth user/secret combination was rejected, please check and try again
error.ERROR_AUTH_USER: It look like you haven't registered the code below, please follow the process before going to the next dialog
error.ERROR_COOKIE: Can't find the 'Cookie' field, please check your input
error.ERROR_CONTENTS: Format of cookie is OK, found '__Secure-3PAPISID' and '__Secure-3PSID' but can't retrieve any data with this settings, maybe you didn't copy all data?
error.ERROR_FORMAT: Format of cookie is NOT OK, likely missing '__Secure-3PAPISID' or '__Secure-3PSID'
error.ERROR_NONE: Format of cookie seams OK, but the returned sub API object is None
error.ERROR_FORBIDDEN: YouTube returned a 403 error, meaning that you login data are not longer valid. Please update the cookie
